explanation: SOCAR, or the State Oil Company of the Republic of Azerbaijan, is a state-owned oil and gas company involved in the exploration, production, refining, and distribution of oil and gas. As detailed in the documents, SOCAR operates in various capacities in the oil and gas sector, including managing pipelines, refineries, and retail gas stations across multiple countries. Thus, it falls squarely within the fossil fuel industry. [Learn more here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SOCAR)
